title: The Ugly Side of YouTube and Hollywood
description:
Happy happy Tuesday!


In today's episode, we are talking about the ugly in YouTube and the entertainment side of things. Some experiences have led to personal struggles and thankfully learned lessons. A friendly reminder that not everything is as pretty as it may seem on a screen.


Want to send Jeanine a message? You can do that here: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy by clicking "Message."


Follow us on Instagram!

Happy and Healthy: https://www.instagram.com/HappyandHealthyPodcast/

Jeanine: https://www.instagram.com/jeanineamapola/


WATCH this episode: https://youtu.be/Adtjllcc1V8


You can also listen to the audio form on Spotify, Apple Podcast, Google Podcast, Overcast, Anchor, Breaker, Pocket Casts, and Radio Public.

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/message Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/happyandhealthy/support
